com.revo.deployr.client.params

Class ProjectCreationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revo.deployr.client.params.ProjectCreationOptions

  • public class ProjectCreationOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Project creation options. Can be used to pre-initialize data in the workspace and working directory for the new project.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ProjectAdoptionOptions adoptionOptions
      Allows the pre-loading of a pre-existing project workspace, project working directory, project history and/or project package dependencies into the current R session.
      boolean blackbox
      Enable to create a blackbox project.
      java.lang.String gridCluster
      Identifies the DeployR grid cluster where the caller would like the project (R session) to execute.
      java.lang.String preloadByDirectory
      Allows the loading of all files found in one or more repository-managed directories into the working directory of the current R sesssion prior to execution.
      ProjectPreloadOptions preloadDirectory
      Allows the loading of one or more named files from the repository into the working directory of the new R session.
      ProjectPreloadOptions preloadWorkspace
      Allows the loading of one or more named binary R objects from the repository into the workspace of the new R session.
      java.util.List<RData> rinputs
      List of DeployR-encoded R objects to be added to the workspace of the new R session.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectCreationOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • blackbox

        public boolean blackbox
        Enable to create a blackbox project. Blackbox projects are a special type of temporary project that limit API access on the underlying R session.

      • rinputs

        public java.util.List<RData> rinputs
        List of DeployR-encoded R objects to be added to the workspace of the new R session.

      • preloadWorkspace

        public ProjectPreloadOptions preloadWorkspace
        Allows the loading of one or more named binary R objects from the repository into the workspace of the new R session.

      • preloadDirectory

        public ProjectPreloadOptions preloadDirectory
        Allows the loading of one or more named files from the repository into the working directory of the new R session.

      • preloadByDirectory

        public java.lang.String preloadByDirectory
        Allows the loading of all files found in one or more repository-managed directories into the working directory of the current R sesssion prior to execution. When loading the contents of more than one directory, use a comma-separated list of directory names. Pre-execution option.

      • adoptionOptions

        public ProjectAdoptionOptions adoptionOptions
        Allows the pre-loading of a pre-existing project workspace, project working directory, project history and/or project package dependencies into the current R session.

      • gridCluster

        public java.lang.String gridCluster
        Identifies the DeployR grid cluster where the caller would like the project (R session) to execute. If there are no slots available on any of the grid nodes within the cluster indicated then the server will attempt to execute the project on a slot on an available grid node that supports MIXED-operations. If no slot meeting these criteria is found, the call will return an RGridException. This feature is optional and available on DeployR Enterprise only.

      • ProjectCreationOptions

        public ProjectCreationOptions()
